name: Catsume: The Cat's Paw
description:
Can you handle the adorableness of all these cats?

v1.0.2 fixes a game-breaking bug preventing the player from getting to the finale in some cases (and modifies price of handgun).

v1.0.4 further fixes the problems from 1.0.2, decreases gun cost again, and some wording fixes.

Credits:
Programming/Design - Matt Woelk
Art - Dustin Bogers
Music and Sound - Daniel Bergman
